EmailTemplate.description: Notification that part(s) have been shipped
EmailTemplate.name: ERP Parts Shipped
EmailTemplate.subject: Parts shipped for ERP {!AcctSeed__Project__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name}
Parts have been shipped for ERP {!AcctSeed__Project__c.Name} . The parts are {!AcctSeed__Product_Part__c.Name}.
